name: [FREE] Pinball Fantasy Arcade 3D Games
description:
FEATURES
• 8 super themed pinball tables, each with its own unique challenge
• Amazing puzzles to solve.
• Multi-ball play. 
• Realistic physics.
• High scores. At the end of each game, you are prompted to enter your name and have your score included.
• Unique soundtrack with atmospheric music, sound effects and voices.

LEVELS
• Western
• Fantasy
• Miner's Adventure
• Pirate Battle
• Pirate Harbor
• Day of Dead
• Lost Temple
• Octopus Island
